title: TF Top Lane Sub for practice tonight
body:
Looking for someone to sub top lane for practice tonight with my team Dynasty.
Gold 3 + but plat preferred. Just for a few ranked 5vs games and possibly a scrim tonight around 8:00pm AEST
Message DYN Intero ingame.

replies.body:
this scrub had a go at me for being silver 4 and said quote "you have over 800 games this season alone and are silver 4" 

people much worse then me, look at acinicus lolking
mere intricacy played 1000 more LoL games than me so i suppose she is also trash for only now gettin gold 5.

If i say gold 3 + don't embarrass yourself by messaging me lol?
Also I didnt "have a go" at you, you just clearly didnt read the post properly.
you basically spat in my face and said that because I have x amount of games I should at least be at x elo, nice logic mate.
I'm a Diamond V top laner

I'm gold 3 (dropped from gold 2 today)
I would love to have a few games, I already added you in game not sure if your on ATM though
